H0.text: Mount Chimborazo is in which South American country. Argentina

H1.text: Mount Chimborazo is in which South American country. Bolivia

H2.text: Mount Chimborazo is in which South American country. Brazil

H3.text: Mount Chimborazo is in which South American country. Ecuador

A4.text: Chimborazo is a stratovolcano in Ecuador and the Cordillera Occidental range of the Andes.

A5.text: Chimborazo is in the Chimborazo Province of Ecuador, 150 km (93 mi) south-southwest of the city of Quito, Ecuador.
